website_summaries.verdict: Kids who need extra ankle support and protection should check out this style from DashSport. Unlike other designs, they include an ankle sleeve.
pros: Ankle support sleeve for more protection than slip-in style guards
cons: Hook-and-loop tab for fastening may irritation some children's legs

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Rockstar Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I just wanted to say thanks! This is a great product with even better customer service. Truly. That goes a long way. We got the wrong size and when I told DashSport about it, and new pair was sent out immediately. I am a busy mom of three and not a lot of extra time for returns - so this "small" thing really impressed me and made me grateful that I purchased them from DashSport! Keep up the great work and awesome products!!!
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs Up for These Shin Guards!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these shin guards in XS for our 4.5yo (He's 41" tall, but weighs maybe 40-42 lbs). He wore them for the first time at rec soccer practice on 3/23. They seem to fit well, and made of quality materials. There were no complaints from him wearing them, considering this is the first time ever he has worn shin guards. My only question is whether he should wear socks under or over these shin guards due to the straps placement. Overall, we are happy with this purchase. So far.
customer_reviews.author: M+K+J

customer_reviews.title: These are great! My son had been playing indoor with some ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great! My son had been playing indoor with some adidas insert shinguards and they were slipping/moving on him. These are much much better. My (7yo) says they are comfortable and he is much happier that they stay in place with the comfortable strap. I also like that the ankle guard is attached and protective. My son scored 13 goals with these, obviously all thanks to this product :)
customer_reviews.author: Heather H.

customer_reviews.title: Great for my 5 year old!
customer_reviews.text: Upon opening the package, I thought the xs would be too small but my son has teeny tiny calves so they will work out perfectly for this season (and hopefully the next!). He is almost 5 years old, 44-45 inches, and weighs 37 pounds for reference.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Great Shin Guards
customer_reviews.text: I bought these (size M) for my son (54") and daughter (55") and they fit well and they like them. My daughter is very particular about fit and she is happy with these. They don't slide around like previous ones (Adidas Ghost sleeve and guard) and don't bunch up like others with padding around the ankle (Umbro). So far, these are the best style/brand we have found. They offer great protection with good fit and less bulk.
customer_reviews.author: Erin B.

customer_reviews.title: Product seems to be of good quality; however
customer_reviews.text: Product seems to be of good quality; however, they were WAY TOO SMALL for my child. I ordered the Small for my daughter who is almost 10 and 4'5". These shin guards looked like they were made for a toddler. Planning to order the Medium.
customer_reviews.author: lababy

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for me. I'm a rather small woman who plays a lot of soccer recreationally. They have protected my shins and ankles much better than anything I've worn in the past as they are more sturdy than anything I've found in stores.
customer_reviews.author: Dick Dawkins

customer_reviews.title: The sizing seems way off
customer_reviews.text: I followed the recommended height and shin measurements and these are way too small. I ordered the youth M, which was supposed to be the right size for someone 60" tall. I contacted the seller and initially they sounded like they would work with me for an exchange, but then when I asked a question about the suggested replacement, they didn't respond and it's been a month now. I don't have time to try to chase after them and get their attention. I gave the shin guards to a friend's child and we found others for my child.
customer_reviews.author: KMW

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love the ankle guards. My son loved them. They're comfy and not too tight on him. He wore them all day around the house and didn't want to take them off haha. I have relatives that are always buying name brands but sometimes they're not everything you need. I found these to be even better than the expensive ones my nephews uses.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Protection and comfortable fit
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old really likes these compared to the shin guards that have a compression sock over them. The size small seems to be perfect for my child who is about 46in tall with a shin length of approximately 7.25. My child seems to find these shin guards pretty comfortable since he seems to forget to take them off. He wore them through practice and a game and didn’t complain at all about pain from getting kicked by opposing players. So I’m happy that my little guy is well protected and comfortable too. I’m happy with my purchase she far.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Cano

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: We used the XS in the fall for my tall 4.5 year old and they were great - just got the Small for her spring soccer as she is a tall almost 5 year old. The shin guards fit well and offer great protection. My daughter finds them comfortable wearing those with soccer socks and cleats. Found the sizing information on the product page very helpful. --------Old review: Very happy with product and seller's attention to detail and commitment to customer service - they have been great communicating and checking up on any issues. The X-small was perfect for a tall 4.5 year old girl.
customer_reviews.author: Stella

customer_reviews.title: Seem like good protection
customer_reviews.text: I bought for kids soccer following the sizing guide on the page. As far as I can tell it fits well, and I haven't had any complaints on the sizing. Since we're talking about 6 y/o soccer, not sure how necessary these are or how well they protect, but overall these seem to do what they are supposed to. I had to return the first pair I ordered since the elastic that holds to the bottom of the foot arrived defective and was held on by a strand out of the bag, but the next pair I received were fine.
customer_reviews.author: dali

customer_reviews.title: Be cautious of sizing!
customer_reviews.text: The quality and style of these shin guards seems great. My daughter is able to get them on and off with some assistance. Be cautious with sizing......my daughter is 3’8 and her shin measurement was just a bit over 7 inches. So, based on the scale I ordered an extra small. However, I should have definitely ordered the small as the extra small seem a bit small on her. Since her first practice is tomorrow, I don’t have time to return them. However, I will be ordering a size small very soon!
customer_reviews.author: Jillann Humphrey

customer_reviews.title: My son called his previous shin guards "the worst thing about soccer" and constantly complained about wearing them
customer_reviews.text: My son called his previous shin guards "the worst thing about soccer" and constantly complained about wearing them. He was unsure of these because of the stirrup that he would have to step on. We tried these because of all the positive reviews. He LOVES them! No complaints anymore which makes me a happy mom! The stirrups are no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality - Fit my 4 year old's tiny legs
customer_reviews.text: My son is small for 4 years, but these fit great. I took away one star because they have a significant curve when hugging the shin. Even though my son has tiny legs, I had to "flatten" them a bit so they weren't too tight around his lower leg. But the size and height are perfect. We did have a little trouble putting his shoe on with the heal wrap and soccer sock. For that reason, you may want to purchase a size up in soccer shoe if you are using these. Overall, I'm happy and would recommend if your child is on the smaller size.
customer_reviews.author: Renee B.

customer_reviews.title: Finally XS shin gaurds
customer_reviews.text: My son is 3 years old and will be starting Soccer and so we needed a small pair of shin gaurds. This was one of the only pairs we could find in an XS. They seem to fit my son well and hopefully they will hold up during the season. The shin guards seem like they are made well and that should not be a problem also super cute.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Great protection and great service!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the xs for my daughter (about 3'9") and like others the curve was to much so they were uncomfortable for her to wear... They sent us the small and told us to donate the first pair we got. This pair is probably a little to big for her but they work and are very comfortable she will be using them for several years. The shin guards are very high quality are well padded to protect shins and ankles. I recommend them for all youth soccer players.
customer_reviews.author: Troy Pohlman

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality & Value
customer_reviews.text: Shin guards are of good quality. The ankle protection is appreciated and helps with keeping the guards in place. My 6 year old son is right on the cusp between XS and S. Decided to go with XS. They don't fit like a custom made pair would obviously, but they fit well enough to get the job done. For the price/quality, I won't mind upgrading to S next season.
customer_reviews.author: R. Batts

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shin guards
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent shin guards, and customer service is just as wonderful. We originally ordered a Small for my 5-year-old son who is 53 pounds and just under four feet tall. They were tight, and when I emailed the seller they sent us another pair that day. Thank you!! I highly recommend these. Very comfortable and stay on without problems throughout games and practice.
customer_reviews.author: Lia DiCaro

customer_reviews.title: Above and Beyond
customer_reviews.text: I'd like to give a shout-out to Rich at DashSport. Customer service is phenomenal; they went above and beyond my expectations to make sure my son was properly fit for the soccer shin guards we purchased. My son was super excited to have the blue shin guards I ordered , and when they didn't fit just right, DashSport worked with us to make it right. Thank You!
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Think and light with great side protection
customer_reviews.text: Great protection on the ankles as well as the shin. He originally had told me what he wanted but I liked the side protection so ordered these instead. Great choice and when they came on he realized that having that extra side protection is making the world of difference! I ordered M and he's almost 8 they could be slightly tighter at the top but it's neither here or there.
customer_reviews.author: T. Kardos

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my 5 year old son who hated the cheap shinguard's we had last year from a big box store. We wore these in 2 soccer games this weekend and they were perfect. My son didn't complain about them once. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Handke

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter just started her third season of soccer and, obviously, needed a new paur of shin guards. We were wary about the quality of these, considering the inexpensive price tag, but went with it and hoped for the best. So glad we made the purchase!! These are the hest shin guards my daughter has ever had, both in fit and protection! Plus, they're stylish! What else could a parent want for their child! 10/10 definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great experience. I had questions and received a response from the owner, who really took care of my questions and my concern. I received the shin guards, and the small fit well for my daughter. If she continues in soccer, I will be purchasing here again, and can safely suggest others do so as well. I always read the reviews before I make a purchase on line, so I hope this helps other people have the positive experience I had with DashSport and Rich!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Horn

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is wrong. Design seems good.
customer_reviews.text: So I measured my son’s height & his shin length. Those + his age all indicated size medium, which I ordered. It is definitely way too big. His calf would need to be about 2” bigger in diameter just to have the Velcro touch his leg in its loosest position. I like the construction & think the design looks good, but unfortunately there is no way he will be able to use these.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Shin Guards
customer_reviews.text: At first we thought they would be too small for my 6 year old but when we put them on everything fit great. We bought one pair for my 6 year old and one pair for my 3 year old. These worked really well for what they needed for soccer. Easy to put on and take off so that the kids could do it. Happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Robin P.

customer_reviews.title: The folks at DashSport are the best. Somewhere along the way the information about my ...
customer_reviews.text: The folks at DashSport are the best. Somewhere along the way the information about my order was lost in translation and we received only one of the pairs we ordered through Amazon. I contacted them and they got the second pair to me the next day so that both my girls could compete in their first (ever) soccer games! The shin guards fit them perfectly, are very comfortable, and durable. The staff were so helpful, courteous, and responsive. I'll be looking to them for other sports gear in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is a bit off
customer_reviews.text: I like the product but the xs were WAY too tiny. Unfortunately, I’ll have to return and order the next size up. On the package received there is a chart that says for 4 year olds we recommend the SMALL but I did not see that picture anywhere on the site.
customer_reviews.author: Shuffle

customer_reviews.title: Well made - good follow up by DashSport.
customer_reviews.text: Used your measuring chart for finding the right size for my 9 year old grandson. It showed small was the best fit for him.. Ordered the small and medium just to be sure. The small will fit him for the rest of 2018, and then he will be using the medium size. These are well made and my grandson loves them. I liked that they followed up by E-Mail to see if we were satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Kzee

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great. We have no complaints - even by my son who's worn them for over three months. They are easy to wash in the dryer (inside a mesh bag) ; and ours even came out fine from an accidental dryer cycle. With regards to size, I bought a size up (SMALL for my average height and slim 5-YEAR-OLD) and it was a good idea. Again, he has not complained about them being tight nor are they loose that they cause trouble.
customer_reviews.author: Andres Cuervo

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: This is our second year in a row using Dashsport Soccer Youth Shin Guards for Summer Soccer. Both kids love them! They stay on the whole game, no sliding down! Will definitely be purchasing the next size up as my kids grow!
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and style.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these for my son to play soccer in. Lots of kids on his team only have the soft shin gaurds, and they have bruises. These fit my skinny 5yr old great and he loves wearing them so mucb, that he wears them around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality and comfortable shinguards
customer_reviews.text: BEST shinguards! I wished we had found out about this brand earlier. The moment my son put these shinguards on, he said “ahhh” with a big smile. Quality is excellent and my son says it’s the most comfortable shinguards he’s ever had.
customer_reviews.author: N. Hsu

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, fit well, easy to put on
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 4 year old, tiny daughter, they fit perfectly. She loves them and says they are comfortable to wear. They can be worn over or under socks, we’ve done both ways. I prefer to put socks over though as it helps hold the under arch piece in place.
customer_reviews.author: CandiPl

customer_reviews.title: Good Product and AMAZING customer service.
customer_reviews.text: The product is good quality and durable. Better yet, the customer service from DashSport is AMAZING!!! I originally ordered the XS based on my son's height however, the shin guards had a significant conclave that made them too small for my son calves. I contacted DashSport on a Sunday evening about exchanging the XS for a small. Within an hour, they responded to my email and already processed the small gobble delivered to my address within two days. And instead of returning the XS they simply asked that I donate them!!! No hassle at all. I am wow'ed and will be ordering from them as my son grows into larger sizes!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly M. Bennett

customer_reviews.title: These shin guards fit well and were comfortable, but after wearing them only a couple of ...
customer_reviews.text: These shin guards fit well and were comfortable, but after wearing them only a couple of times the ankle area started to fray badly. Really disappointed with the quality. Update: customer service is awesome! They are sending out a replacement set ASAP.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits 5'2'' Daughter
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous about the sizing, but they fit my 11 year old daughter perfectly! She is 5'2 with a slim build. If your child is taller than 5'2, or has thicker legs, I would recommend going with an adult shin guard.
customer_reviews.author: Tammey B.

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Shin Guards
customer_reviews.text: I know you can get similar shin guards for less money, but these are the brand I bought for my older daughter 2 seasons ago. We had great luck with them and decided to stick with the brand for my younger daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Lil Mondu

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Bought a set of these for my son and had an issue with one of the elastic bands breaking at the stitch point. Contacted dashsport and almost immediately received a response notifying me of a refund for that product and a replacement was on the way. The replacement set arrived and have been used for 2 practices so far. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: chrisison

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for my 10 yr old
customer_reviews.text: After trying 5 different pairs of shin guards for my daughter, she gave two big thumbs up to these. Others were either too short or the right length but two wide for a child’s leg. These fit perfect and she loved the look.
customer_reviews.author: Croppyboy

customer_reviews.title: Good comfortable fit
customer_reviews.text: Fit great for my 8 year old with use for hopefully a couple more years.
customer_reviews.author: P and J

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and size
customer_reviews.text: My son loves them and they fit perfectly. The ones he was wearing prior ended up being way to big, but we didn't realize that until we found these as a replacement and say the measurements. The construction is also great. Very happy with the purchase and will definitely being buying the next size of these when it is time.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Faucett

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter’s other shin gaud kept falling down or out of her socks. This gave her good ankle support and it stayed in place. It’s very comfortable. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought for 10-year old son. While we like the guards that slip into socks, his legs were getting pretty beat p so needed some that provided the extra coverage all the way through the ankle bone.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen A.

customer_reviews.title: A little too small
customer_reviews.text: These seemed very nice, just too small for my son. Edit:. I should've edited this before now, but this company was great to deal with. I returned the shin guards and was refunded. They contacted me then to see if I would like a bigger size free of charge as they were a new company. The new ones fit perfectly and I am so grateful! Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: MaryWam

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Safety is essential, these work well on my 4 year old. My little ones shins have been protected from the exposure of kicks and other knocks. They seem comfortable and they don't slip down.
customer_reviews.author: M.Mae.

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids
customer_reviews.text: My boys like these shinguards. Our only complaint is that the straps are way too long and get in the way sometimes when slipping socks over them. We cut the excess off ours.
customer_reviews.author: M. Goodwin

customer_reviews.title: Washed several times and they have held up nicely. My boys are 5 and 6
customer_reviews.text: Very durable. Washed several times and they have held up nicely. My boys are 5 and 6, lean, 40 and 42 inches in height. This will definitely be the last season they wear them because the fit perfectly. If I have gotten a bigger size they would have been too big.
customer_reviews.author: C Santos

customer_reviews.title: Run small
customer_reviews.text: These seem to be very nice (I like the ankle support and the ankle protection and they seem to be good quality) but I followed the size charts and ordered my daughter a medium and they're too small. We even measured her before we ordered and they should be about two inches higher (towards her knee) than they are. I don't plan on returning them because her old ones are ruined and practice starts tomorrow.
customer_reviews.author: Megs

customer_reviews.title: Protects ankles too
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product for my daughter who is 10 because I wanted shin guards that do not only offer her protection for her shins, but also her ankles. This was perfect and priced reasonably. It also arrived quickly. My daughter likes that is is easy to put on and take it off.
customer_reviews.author: Mama from Maui

customer_reviews.title: Well made skin guards from great seller
customer_reviews.text: These are great, arrived quickly as described, size chart was accurate as the XS fits my 4 year old perfectly with room for growth. Seem extremely well made. Company customer service and follow up seems really thorough and professional, they even sent a bonus guide for different ways to wear the guards. I'd definitely buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: NYCArtDirector

customer_reviews.title: Double check sizing guidelines.
customer_reviews.text: These seem to be very good quality, however the sizing was a bit of an issue for us to figure out which one to get. Our daughter is 7 years old and a bit tall for her age. I measured her leg as the instructions on the sizing said, and ordered small. These are too small for her. Other than that, the product is good.
customer_reviews.author: Soledad Theel

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality, Great Price
customer_reviews.text: These are adorable! I bought my daughter one for her first year of soccer (she's 4 1/2) and they fit great! She's tall, and they're sitting right under her knees, so these should be great this season and probably next. The ankle cushioning is high-quality and the shin plates seem well constructed. We're happy with them!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Great quality shin guards
customer_reviews.text: The shin guards are exactly as pictured, and better than I expected. I got an XS for my daughter who is just a couple of weeks shy of 6. She is about 3'7", and they fit perfectly, so sizing is as expected. The padded ankle was not expected but will be appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: Mumsy

customer_reviews.title: Shin guards that stay in Place ⚽️
customer_reviews.text: My 12 year old daughter loves these shin guards for soccer! She loves how they fit & stay in place & how easy they are to take on and off~ Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kari W.

customer_reviews.title: Sizing chart is wrong
customer_reviews.text: The size is waaaaaay off!! My daughter is a TINY eight year old and I followed the sizing chart when ordering her a size small. They wouldn’t fit a four year old. Sizing is waaaayyyy off. These shin guards were way more expensive than many I looked at but I figured t was worth it to protect my daughter. Now the cost to ship back makes it not worth it to return them. Boooo. Buy wayyyy bigger than sizing chart suggests.
customer_reviews.author: ElRoy21

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: Great guards! You can punch the shin with no pain. Love the ankle support and protection! The large size fit great on a 10 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph B.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great shin guards. My daughter has no problem when playing with the bigger kids.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great equipment
customer_reviews.text: My grandkids had their first game today and the shin guards for perfectly. In fact, they were the only players that didn't complain about their shin guards. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: SRL

customer_reviews.title: Fit just right and easy to put on/take off!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Good price Fit perfectly 7yr old son says they are easy to put on and take off. Cons: None
customer_reviews.author: Antonio

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, well made shin guards
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, well made shin guards. My 7 year old can put them on and off by himself. My only suggestion for improvement is to make the velcro straps covered on the sides a little bit so it's not so scratchy. All shin guard velcro straps irritate my son's legs so this is a common occurrence, he wears socks under to avoid the scratching.
customer_reviews.author: Traveling T

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping and good fit for my 4yr old daughter and didn't know ...
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping and good fit for my 4yr old daughter and didn't know it had the ankle pads too so that's a plus!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Neville

customer_reviews.title: I think over socks these are better but my son won’t wear them bc they dig ...
customer_reviews.text: I think over socks these are better but my son won’t wear them bc they dig in too much, probably great for most, we just had to get the kind where the sleeve holds the shin guard in place and so far he likes those!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Cook

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product
customer_reviews.text: Great quality product. One small con - top strap is too long. My son is a very skinny 5-year-old and I have to adjust it for him. Since it’s a stretch material, I wish it was little shorter.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie J

customer_reviews.title: Kid loves them
customer_reviews.text: looks cool. only thing is it's a bit too short for my son. He doesn't have long shin and I pick the size based on the website recommendation. I think you should go one size up to make it worth the money since kids grow fast. My son probably need a bigger pair by next year.
customer_reviews.author: Zhao

customer_reviews.title: My daughter says they are comfortable and true to suggested size
customer_reviews.text: My daughter says they are comfortable and true to suggested size. Also, good quality. They have worked out well. Will be returning others to get another pair of these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Professional looking and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son who lost his original pair. This came in time for His summer camp. They look great, function well, and the size just fits perfectly. They are comfortable and pray that they can last for few years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Sherman Jiang

customer_reviews.title: She's strengthening her sprained ankle & these are perfect for protecting & supporting her ankles
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as pictured. Protects my daughter's ankles & shins during soccer. She's strengthening her sprained ankle & these are perfect for protecting & supporting her ankles. I followed the size chart & they fit her perfectly. Well made!
customer_reviews.author: NLP

customer_reviews.title: Bottom strap broke during the first use.
customer_reviews.text: The bottom strap broke during the first use, which is something we could sew back or just tuck into the shoe. It fits fine according to the height/weight/age recommendations for 7 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Double A

customer_reviews.title: worked well
customer_reviews.text: These held up well. After about a year they rip. But I think that's about what you can expect with equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Camilla

customer_reviews.title: Great guard
customer_reviews.text: Youth shin guards for 8 year old size small fit perfectly. I like the fact that the ankle protection is not a separate piece. They are comfortable on him and do not slip.
customer_reviews.author: amgagliano

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: My kid loves these. Really nice fit and good protection. Also very comfortable. My son doesnt take them off after practice. He waits till he gets home. I remember I couldnt wait to remove my shin guards as a kid.
customer_reviews.author: Scooby

customer_reviews.title: Thanks
customer_reviews.text: Great customer service to provide replacement. Hard to contact as email provided was not working.
customer_reviews.author: Powell

customer_reviews.title: works fine for a six year old
customer_reviews.text: I used the sizing guide and the fit was appropriate. Also mid-way through the soccer season, they seem durable.
customer_reviews.author: History guy

customer_reviews.title: High quality soccer gear.  Great seller.
customer_reviews.text: size small fits perfectly. Mostly wear xs clothing but went a size up on these. These are very comfortable and a good quality. They stay put and won’t be coming loose every 5 minutes too. Seller was quick and professional.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua T. Wire

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves them
customer_reviews.text: I can't review these for myself, but my daughter says they are very comfortable, and she says it's improved her confidence with the ankle guard as well.
customer_reviews.author: Dan A

customer_reviews.title: Still going strong!
customer_reviews.text: Recently completed a second season of soccer with our pair and they're still going strong. The additional ankle protection is a plus. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: mack1905

customer_reviews.title: Great shin guards at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my 4 year old, size x-small, and they fit perfect. Seem to be great quality. He has no complaints of them being uncomfortable, which is great. Only thing is I wish they were washing machine safe but it says to just wipe down for cleaning instructions. I will spray them with vinegar and sit them out in the sun.
customer_reviews.author: Britney

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we've looking for
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit. My son is 10 years old, small for his age, and the M size fits perfectly well. He's coming out from an ankle fracture and we needed a pair of shin guards with ankle protection. We tried the Adidas, a couple of Nike, and did not feel comfortable or were not the right fit. These DashSport Soccer shin guards were the winner!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Run very small
customer_reviews.text: Work as intended but run very small. What I mean by small is the elastic ankle area is very tight
customer_reviews.author: Sir Mister

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Fit my eight year old well. She only wore them one season but they lasted and we’re comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin

customer_reviews.title: Fit well
customer_reviews.text: Fit well and look good. My daughter starts soccer in April and these look like they will work well.
customer_reviews.author: C. Boone

customer_reviews.title: Works for age.
customer_reviews.text: Good size however the strap has already ripped and my son had only use them three times. So the quality could be a little better but overall it will work for the season
customer_reviews.author: A and R's mom

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great shin guards. The only reason for the 4-star review is because the straps aren't tight enough around my son's calves. I ordered the medium, and would advise others to size up if you're concerned about fit. My son is tall for his age, the mediums fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: B. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: My son likes them, he just has a hard time with the seams of the straps rubbing
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Sue Lambert

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Fits as expected and the wear and tear has been very minimal over the course of 2 seasons
customer_reviews.author: Joshua W

customer_reviews.title: Excellent ankle padding!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter finally stopped complaining about people kicking her ankles!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: too small
customer_reviews.text: It's on the smaller end. M is too narrow for my 9 yo. He wears M from other brand
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: 2 Thumbs Up!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 9 yr old daughter because the Adidas Ghost Shin Gaurds didn't fit true to size and provided no coverage. These are true to size and give her the protection that she needs on game days and practices. I will return when she needs more.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy S

customer_reviews.title: Difficult fit for little ankles.
customer_reviews.text: Fit was not good. The support around ankles protruded and preventing cleats from fitting. Mobility an issues and sockes were near impossible to put over (or under) when put inot a cleat.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Shin Guards
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Shin Guards! My son loves them too. I love that they have great coverage on the ankles. Awesome product!
customer_reviews.author: User

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son is happy with the product. Loves the color and how they fit.
customer_reviews.author: lilly navarrete

customer_reviews.title: Fit well
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old daughter is 46" tall and the XS fits her perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: C. James

customer_reviews.title: the product is very easy to put on Before all the practices and games ...
customer_reviews.text: We Purchased this product for my son who loves to play soccer, the product is very easy to put on Before all the practices and games that he has. They are also very comfortable and I love the way they are very adjustable because my son is very thin! This is a really great brand
customer_reviews.author: stasha floyd

customer_reviews.title: Easy to get on and off and great fit!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect. My daughter finds them very comfortable and relatively easy for her to get on and off. Provides good coverage and we are 6 practices in and they have held up fine. Would by again when she needs the next size up!
customer_reviews.author: uncgal

customer_reviews.title: They are great. My son thinks they are cool
customer_reviews.text: They are great. My son thinks they are cool, but he’s 4 so what does he know. Just kidding, they are pretty cool.
customer_reviews.author: Kimmy5754

customer_reviews.title: Buy with confidence...
customer_reviews.text: Fit my 4-year-old perfectly. He loved them and they worked great during his soccer practices.
customer_reviews.author: BrettSEvans

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Great my son is 6 we got an XS, prob should have got a S but will be fine for the fall season.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa P

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and strong
customer_reviews.text: My son likes this very much. This are comfortable, but at the same time provide him with the protection he needs. Since it is only one piece the shin is not moving around.
customer_reviews.author: jannette velazquez

customer_reviews.title: Great for my young sons.
customer_reviews.text: A lot of shinguards that I buy online are much smaller than expected, but these fit perfectly according the guidelines. They are easy for my 7-year old to get on and off by himself. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Margot1516

product_meta.title: DashSport Soccer Shin Guards -Youth Sizes Best Kids Soccer Equipment with Ankle Sleeves - Great for Boys and Girls
feature_bullets: Young Players: Our Shin Guards Are Made for Boys and Girls to Keep Them Protected While Still Being Comfortable and Flexible
Complete Protection: Unlike Slip in Style Guards, DashSport Youth Shin Guards Have an Ankle Support Sleeve to Protect Younger Players During Practice and Games
Sure Fit: Please See Our Sizing Chart in the Images Section, or the Description Section Below, for Selecting the Best Fit
Warranty: 1 Year Free No-Hassle Replacement Guarantee
